title: 114_hr6226
content: Pre-Claims Undermine Seniors' Health Act of 2016 or the PUSH Act of 2016 This bill delays the Medicare demonstration for pre-claim reviewnbsp. Of home health services and requires the Centers for Medicare amp. Medicaid Services (CMS) to report on such pre-claim review. Specifically, CMS shall delay or suspend the demonstration by the later of: (1) one year after either the bill's enactment or thenbsp, demonstration's scheduled start-date, as applicable, or (2) six months after CMS submits its report. nbsp,
